  2. Add 1 {{Tooltip|[[#Cheese Wedge|Cheese Wedge]]|{{RecursiveFood/Cheese Wedge}}}}.

  4. Add 1 Carrot.
  5. Add 1 Corn.
  6. Add 1 Tomato.
  7. Bake in an oven on medium for 15 seconds.

Template:RecursiveFood/Vegetable Soup.page_text:
In a cooking pot:
  1. Add 1 Potato.
  2. Add 1 Carrot.
  3. Add 1 Corn.
  4. Add 1 Eggplant.
  5. Add 10u Water.
  6. Cook on a stove at medium temperature for 20 seconds.

Template:RecursiveFood/Waffle Cone.page_text:

  2. Add 1u {{Tooltip|[[#Sugar|Sugar]]|{{Template:RecursiveFood/Sugar}}}}.
  3. Mix in an ice cream mixer for 10 seconds.

Template:RecursiveFood/Waffles.page_text:

  1. Add 2 {{Tooltip|[[#Dough|Dough]]|{{RecursiveFood/Dough}}}}.
  2. Add 10u {{Tooltip|[[#Sugar|Sugar]]|{{Template:RecursiveFood/Sugar}}}}.
  3. Grill at medium temperature for 10 seconds.

In a cooking pot:
  1. Add 20u Water.

Template:RecursiveFood/Xenomeatbread.page_text:

  3. Add 3 {{Tooltip|[[#Cheese Wedge|Cheese Wedges]]|{{RecursiveFood/Cheese Wedge}}}}.

Template:RecursiveFood/Zurek.page_text:
In a cooking pot:

  4. Add 1 Onion.
  5. Add 10u Water.
  6. Add 10u {{Tooltip|[[#Flour|Flour]]|{{Template:RecursiveFood/Flour}}}}.
  7. Cook on a stove at medium temperature for 20 seconds.
